about_the_game: Cakewalk Mutant Rebellion is a suite of 300 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with the sonic artillery for dance floor warfare. This library is rich with twisted takes on retro dance sounds, mutations of modern pop sounds, and face-melting custom creations.
detailed_description: Cakewalk Mutant Rebellion is a suite of 300 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with the sonic artillery for dance floor warfare. This library is rich with twisted takes on retro dance sounds, mutations of modern pop sounds, and face-melting custom creations.
name: Z3TA+ 2 - Cakewalk Mutant Rebellion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista 32-bit/64-bit (SP2), Windows 7 32-bit/64-bit (SP1), Windows 8 32-bit/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 minimum resolution, 32-bit
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Expansion Pack for Z3TA+ 2. Requires Z3TA+ 2 which is available separately

short_description: Cakewalk Mutant Rebellion is a suite of 300 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with the sonic artillery for dance floor warfare. This library is rich with twisted takes on retro dance sounds, mutations of modern pop sounds, and face-melting custom creations.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
